DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of an inactivated, non adjuvanted A(H1N1)v influenza vaccine in 120 pregnant women. Study procedures will include 2 doses of vaccine, blood samples, cord blood samples at delivery and recording temperature and vaccine side effects in a memory aid for 7 days following each vaccination. Participants will be involved in study related procedures about 3 at 5 months.
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity and Safety of an Inactivated Non-adjuvanted A(H1N1)v Influenza Vaccine in Pregnant Women
